00025 #ifndef _ROBOT_ROBOT_
00026 #define _ROBOT_ROBOT_
00027 
00028 #include <robot/robot>
00029 
00030 #include <base/array>
00031 
00032 #include <robot/Platform>
00033 #include <robot/Manipulator>
00034 #include <robot/Controllable>
00035 
00036 
00037 namespace robot {
00038 
00042 class Robot : public Controllable
00043 {
00044 public:
00045   virtual String getName() const     { return name; }
00046   
00047   virtual ref<ControlInterface> getControlInterface(String interfaceName="") const throw(std::invalid_argument) = 0;
00048 
00049   virtual ref<Platform>        getPlatform() const     { return platform; }
00050   virtual reflist<Manipulator> getManipulators() const { return manipulators; }
00051   virtual array<Vector>        getManipulatorOffsets() const { return manipulatorOffsets; }
00052 
00053 
00054 protected:
00055   Robot() {}
00056   Robot(const Robot& r) 
00057     : name(r.name), platform(r.platform),
00058       manipulators(r.manipulators), manipulatorOffsets(r.manipulatorOffsets)
00059     {}
00060 
00061   String name;      
00062   
00063   ref<Platform>        platform; 
00064   reflist<Manipulator> manipulators; 
00065   array<Vector>        manipulatorOffsets; 
00066 
00067 };
00068 
00069 
00070 } // robot

00072 #endif
